title.narrative: COMMUNICATION, ADVOCACY AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: By 2021, CO will have raised the consciousness of key external audiences on the importance of equitable investments in children and will have created opportunities for supporters and influencers to take action and support the cause of children in Niger, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, CO will have raised the consciousness of key external audiences on the importance of equitable investments in children and will have created opportunities for supporters and influencers to take action and support the cause of children in Niger

description.narrative: The year-long celebration of the anniversary of the CRC was an opportunity for UNICEF and partners to engage stakeholders to the full implementation of the CRC, raise greater awareness of the situation of children, and forge strategic alliances with celebrities, influencers and youth to advocate for children's rights. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of people reached on UNICEF social media channels

Number of initiatives that engage civil society partners and/or coalitions to advocate together with UNICEF for children
